response.overview: Wobbly Stan was produced as an illicit benzodiazepine awareness campaign for Redcar and Cleveland. The film is based around our research with users of this drug and tells the story of an older illicit benzo user (Wobbly Stan) trying to put off a younger user who is trying to score illicit benzos from him.  The story was loosely based on Dr. Seussâ€™s Green Eggs and Ham. It features the voice of Mark Benton.
response.title: Wobbly Stan - the Benzo Man

results.name: Wobbly Stan the Benzo Man from Redcar
